Package entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Manages the player's stats, sprites and interactions. Needs to be instantiated in the GamePanel object so that its attributes can be accessed by other classes.
Author:
Jeffrey Jin (jjj9)

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(GamePanel gamePanel, InputHandler input)
      Constructs a new Player object and creates its hitbox and area of sight on the game map. Links Settings and Sound singleton to this object. Also sets the default values of the player and loads its sprite images.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - GamePanel object that is used to the game
      input - InputHandler object that manages the players keyboard inputs

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultValues

      public void setDefaultValues()
      Sets the default values of the player.

    • spawnPlayer

      public void spawnPlayer()
      Sets the players current location to the start position of the current map.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the Player's stats depending on what is happening in the game. If Player's health points are zero, the user is sent to the gameover screen. Checks if using is pressing movement keys and moves the Player in the corresponding direction. Changes the players sprite depending on which direction the user is moving in. Also checks if player is colliding with an object or entity.

    • objectInteraction

      public void objectInteraction(int index)
      Determines the type of object the player is interacting with and calls the corresponding event.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the object in the object array that the Player is interating with

    • farmerInteraction

      public void farmerInteraction(int index)
      Called when Player and Farmer collide with each other. Player loses one life and both Player and Farmer get reset back to their starting locations. Also plays a sound and displays an appropriate mesage.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the farmer in the farmer array that the Player is interacting with

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphic2)
      Draws Player with the appropriate image based on the direction Player is moving in.
      Parameters:
      graphic2 - main graphic used by gamePanel to draw the maps sprites and tiles

    • freezeFarmers

      public void freezeFarmers()
      An ability that freezes the farmers whenever the H key is pressed If any farmers are in the freezeArea, they are frozen for 1 second This ability has a 5 second cooldown
